title: Unable to connect when in-game patch 7.3 problem. Please fix riot!!!!
body: So i've encountered this problem a few days ago upon the 7.3 patch updates. Whenever i get in game it says "Unable to connect please try again". I've tried continuous fixes like reinstalling the game, bug fixing, firewall and updating drivers. But none of it seems to work. If anyone can help me please do as this problem is annoying af!!!!!

replies.body: This issue can happen when your network is failing to reach the game servers.  I know you've tried a few steps, but actually none of those directly strengthen your network.  Instead, try out the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix this up.  I hope that helps!
My internet is acutally fine. I don't know whether it's just the server(Oceania). And i;ve tried most of the things on that site already. I just hope riot inspects the problem and fix it!!!
